name: db-backup-manager
description: A powerful PostgreSQL backup manager with automated scheduling and Docker support

scripts.install: bun install && bun --cwd apps/dbm-backend install && bun --cwd apps/dbm-frontend install && bun --cwd packages/dbschema install
scripts.dev: concurrently "bun --cwd apps/dbm-backend run dev" "bun --cwd apps/dbm-frontend run dev"
scripts.lint: bun --cwd apps/dbm-backend run lint && bun --cwd apps/dbm-frontend run lint
scripts.format: bun --cwd apps/dbm-backend run format && bun --cwd apps/dbm-frontend run format

author: Nick Friedrich
